issue.title: [Gandiva] Fix double-conversion linker issue
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Build failing with following error:

`c++: error: double-conversion_ep/src/double-conversion_ep/lib/libdouble-conversion.a: No such file or directory`

We can use installed library instead of building from source.
